strengths: State-of-art reasoning (Sonnet 4.5), extended context window, artifacts support
weaknesses: No local deployment, rate limits on API, no built-in approval system
notes: Best for general reasoning tasks, lacks human-in-the-loop controls

strengths: Wide model selection (GPT-4, o1), custom GPTs, DALL-E integration
weaknesses: No transparent approval workflow, limited RAG customization
notes: General purpose, not tailored for autonomous agent scenarios

strengths: Flexible agent orchestration, wide integration ecosystem, open source
weaknesses: No built-in UI, requires significant custom development, steep learning curve
Unstable outputs, no approval gates, high token consumption
notes: Experimental, not production-ready for critical tasks

strengths: High-quality vector search, managed service, scalable
weaknesses: External dependency, cost scales with usage, no HWP support out-of-box
notes: Best-in-class vector DB, requires integration work

strengths: Local deployment, fast setup, good for prototyping
notes: Good for development, lacks enterprise features

strengths: Annotation workflows, quality control, labeling marketplace
weaknesses: Focused on data labeling, not general agent approval
notes: Specialized for ML training data, not agent decisions

strengths: Integrated assistant+agent+approval+RAG, local-first, SSE-driven UI, HWP support
weaknesses: Early stage (P0), limited scalability testing, naive RAG implementation
notes: Designed for autonomous tasks with human oversight, Korean document support
